players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked by Diana's sudden death. We should all be on high alert and work together to find out who did this."
Bob: "Let's focus on finding the killer and not jumping to conclusions. We don't know who Diana was talking to or what she might have discovered."
You: "I agree with Bob. Let's keep an open mind and focus on gathering information to help us identify the killer."
Bob: "Let's ask Charlie if he noticed anything unusual last night."
